body.p: The estimates of the present value of future cash flows are further disaggregated into estimates of the present value of future cash outflows, showing separately the amount of insurance acquisition cash flows, and estimates of the present value of future cash inflows. The separate disclosure of the estimates of the present value of future cash inflows, including any investment components:

li.p: provides useful information about the volume of sales that supplements the insurance revenue presented in the statement(s) of financial performance; and
allows users of financial statements to compare the volume of business written in prior years with the volume of contracts written in the current year.
